commitResults.messageTitle: Add level-0 increments Rename, Greet, Exit
Add Level 1 Echo
commitResults.messageBody: Add personality to Yapper's text

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level 2 Add, List
commitResults.messageBody:
Add ability to store user input and output all of them when requested.
Add line divider strings

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level-3 Mark as Done; Made program obey SRP
commitResults.messageBody:
Added the ability to mark Tasks as Done or Undone;
Split Yapper into more classes to handle one responsibility each:
1 Yapper initializes TaskManager and runs the UserInterface.
2 UserInterface chooses the instruction based on user input.
3 TaskManager handles the various tasks stored by the user.
4 InputStringHandler parses strings inputted by the user.
5 OutputStringHandler formats strings to output to the user.
6 Instruction handles the various instructions (implemented so far).
7 Task contains features of tasks such as description is done-ness.
8 CommonStrings contains important strings used in the program.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level 4 ToDos, Events, Deadlines
commitResults.messageBody:
Modified code to include the 3 new Task subtypes:
Add taskToString() for all of Task, TaskTodo, TaskDeadline and TaskEvent
InputStringHandler can now parse the 3 new instructions
OutputStringHandler can now format the 3 new instructions
Instruction now includes the 3 new instruction types
UserInterface now handles the 3 new instruction types

commitResults.messageTitle: Renamed class that stores ChatBot speeches from CommonStrings to StringStorage.
commitResults.messageBody:
The old name was not representative of what it currently does.
Also modified the messages sent upon startup and shutdown, as I felt the old one was bad. The new one sounds better.

commitResults.messageTitle: Amended abbr for Todo Deadline Event when printed to more closely align to the CS2113 website
Amended Constructor arguments to be more descriptive
Extracted 2 strings into a constant
commitResults.messageBody: For code readability and easier modification later on

commitResults.messageTitle: Moved the print methods to the respective task classes
commitResults.messageBody: This shortens the definition for class OutputStringHandler

commitResults.messageTitle: Renamed variable to make clearer what it is
Fix OOB error caused when making deadline or event

commitResults.messageTitle: Add tentative method definitions for error handling
Package classes, removed ADD from Instruction Set
commitResults.messageBody:
Package entire program into one, also packaged the Task, Todo, Deadline, Event class into its own package/
add and todo used to do the same thing, so add instruction is subsumed under todo instruction.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'master' into branch-Level-5
refactor out main program loop into its own method
commitResults.messageBody:
startYappin now consists of print statements and a loop, but no switch case statement
handleInstruction consists of a big switch case statement

commitResults.messageTitle: Moved exception, instruction classes into their own package
commitResults.messageBody:
Exception classes include: ErrorHandler YapperException
Instruction classes include: InstructionHandler Instruction

Add exception handling to Yapper program

commitResults.messageTitle: Update runtest to follow the new packaging
Changed code layout of StringStorage for cleanliness
Updated input.txt and expected.txt, shortened code for runtest.bat
Simplified the code in various places
commitResults.messageBody:
Removal of duplicated code:
    The various handleAddInstruction methods were consolidated into 1
    The various handle Mark and Unmark methods were consolidated into 1
Cleaning up of print methods:
    printAddedTask has been removed from Task children as it is currently unecessary
    printWithDividers to clearly separate input messages and output messages
Task children prefixes refactored into StringStorage
Exception handling added to parseUserInput
Various comments make to separate code more clearly

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'cleanUpCode'
Renamed TaskManager to TaskHandler for consistency
commitResults.messageBody: Moved TaskHandler to task package

commitResults.messageTitle: Update readme for Setup and User Guide
Fix error in code that was storing event dates wrongly
commitResults.messageBody: end date was stored as both start and end date

commitResults.messageTitle: Use Java Collections ArrayList<Task> instead of an array
Amend code to reflect using arrayList instead of array
commitResults.messageBody:
Method parameters and element access changed to reflect new data structure,
No longer a need for maxCapacity since data structure is now dynamic and not static
No longer a need for checkIfListFull since data structure has no maxCapacity
No longer a need for try-catch in handleAddInstruction

commitResults.messageTitle: Amend code to reflect using arrayList instead of array
commitResults.messageBody: No longer a need for maxCapacity

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Delete to list of instructions

Removed BYE from InstructionType

Add DELETE to handleInstruction (in InstructionHandler class)
Add handleDeleteInstruction (in InstructionHandler class)
Add deleteTask (in TaskHandler class)
Add printDeletedTask (in Task class)
Add output message to StringStorage when task is deleted

commitResults.messageTitle: Move file handling methods into its own class
Add error handling when reading from user or file
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed stringToTask methods (in Task Todo Deadline Event), now this responsibility is to parseFileInput (in SaveFileHandler class)
Add methods (in ErrorHandler class) to check for missing arguments for Todo Deadline List or if task type and status are valid
The abovementioned new methods for missing arguments are used in in parseFileInput method (in SaveFileHandler class) and parseUserInput method (in InputStringHandler class)
Add relavant error messages (in StringStorage class)
